Package io.straas.android.sdk.streaming

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseImageFilter
    BaseImageFilter is a base filter for StraaS streaming SDK.
    CameraController
    CameraController provides methods for camera and flash related operation and status getter.
    LiveEventConfig
    Configuration of a live event.
    LiveEventConfig.Builder
    Builder of LiveEventConfig.
    ScreencastStreamConfig
    ScreencastStreamConfig is used in StreamManager.prepare(ScreencastStreamConfig) for screencast.
    ScreencastStreamConfig.Builder  
    StreamConfig
    StreamConfig is used in StreamManager.prepare(io.straas.android.sdk.streaming.StreamConfig, android.view.TextureView).
    StreamConfig.Builder  
    StreamManager
    StreamManager is used to manage a rtmp client for StraaS.
    StreamStatsReport
    StreamStatsReport provides streaming related instant information.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Profile
    Profile.
    Resolution
    Resolution.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    StreamConfig.CAMERA_TYPE
    Camera types.
    StreamManager.StreamState
    Show state of StreamManager.
